name: TAP SPORTS Fishing Game
description:
The most realistic fishing game for your phone is here! From the creators of Deer Hunter and Tap Sports Baseball comes a brand-new and exciting take on fishing with real-time multiplayer, navigable 3D environments, and much, much more. Hop in your boat, grab your rod and lures, and track down big, rare, and exotic fish with the help of your trusty loyal companion – your dog!

EASY TO LEARN, DIFFICULT TO MASTER
Catching a fish is as easy as casting out your rod. But can you deliver on a Perfect Catch? Can you get ON FIRE with three perfect casts in a row, and land legendary lunkers to set new World Records?

REALISTIC FISHING 3D SIMULATION
Use your smarts, strategy, sonar, and attractant to land the biggest fish! This fishing simulator brings you hundreds of different species to catch, whether you want to relax or compete in fishing tournaments. Go angling to hook highly detailed fish in beautiful 3D environments. Tap Sports Fishing provides the most realistic fishing experience mobile games have to offer. Get the full fishing experience even when there’s not a lake or river for miles around.

FEATURES
• Clash with other anglers: Compete in real time PvP to prove you're a master fisherman!
• Level up your gear: Collect and upgrade your lures to take on the biggest fish in the sea!
• Unlock exotic locations: Fish all over the world in beautiful locations, each with new fish species! Start your journey in a hidden tropical getaway in the Gulf of Mexico!
• Get hooked: It's always fishing season - new events every day!
• Cast your rod at just the right time to see if you can make the Perfect Catch. Make three perfect casts in a row and you’re ON FIRE!
• Catch bigger fish faster with new boats, lures and rods!
• Use unique fishing powerups, like Fish Attractant, Bonus Bait and Sonar.
• Sport hunting game with over 100 realistic and unique fish to catch!


PLEASE NOTE:
- This game is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items, which will charge your iTunes account. You can disable in-app purchasing by adjusting your device settings.
- This game is not intended for children.
- Please buy carefully.
- Advertising appears in this game.
- This game may permit users to interact with one another (e.g., chat rooms, player to player chat, messaging) depending on the availability of these features.
- Linking to social networking sites are not intended for persons in violation of the applicable rules of such social networking sites.
- A network connection is required to play.
- For information about how Tap Sports Fishing collects and uses your data, please read our privacy policy at: www.fishinggames.games/privacy
